title: Brace Yourself for a Summer of Inflation
description: Quentin Fottrell, managing editor, personal finance at MarketWatch, discusses inflation with Andrew Keshner, MarketWatch tax reporter, and Gregory Robb, senior Washington correspondent.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
